about_the_game:
Don't want to grind? Get all [Mysterious Antiques Set - Halloween 2022] decorations for a slight bargain with this DLC!

Included Items:
  • Victorian Floor
  • Gothic Brick
  • Cracked Doorframe
  • Neon Spiderweb
  • Oil Lamps
  • Batwing Plant
  • Spooky Fireplace
  • Looking Glass
  • Victorian Table Set
  • Creepy Cuddly Toy
  • Coat Rack

**PLEASE NOTE:
If you already own any item from the list, purchasing this DLC will not provide you an extra set/ duplicate nor be discounted off of the final price. You will only receive the items you have yet to obtain.
